tool_description: The Cover Genius XCover distribution platform enables your business to sell more insurance. With dynamic pricing and intelligent data-science optimisations, your customers get the right product at the right price. The XCover platform works with a panel of underwriters, so you can create custom policies that are relevant to your customer’s needs.XCover provides best-in-class insurance products for companies looking to sell insurance at the point of sale.
